about_the_game:
Experience the immersive soundtrack for Starship Horizons Bridge Simulator.

This Astral Symphony was composed by Joel Everett, an Emmy award-winning composer and keyboardist. Recent works have included scores to the indie film 'Lake of Fire' from Highway 29 Motion Pictures (currently in post-production), the short film 'Garden of Life' and the documentary 'Merger: Making the Twin City' for WSTV 13 (aired on UNC-TV) for which he won a regional Emmy. He holds a Bachelor of Music Composition from Columbia College of Chicago and an Associate of Arts from College of DuPage.
detailed_description:
Experience the immersive soundtrack for Starship Horizons Bridge Simulator.

This Astral Symphony was composed by Joel Everett, an Emmy award-winning composer and keyboardist. Recent works have included scores to the indie film 'Lake of Fire' from Highway 29 Motion Pictures (currently in post-production), the short film 'Garden of Life' and the documentary 'Merger: Making the Twin City' for WSTV 13 (aired on UNC-TV) for which he won a regional Emmy. He holds a Bachelor of Music Composition from Columbia College of Chicago and an Associate of Arts from College of DuPage.
name: Starship Horizons: Official Soundtrack
short_description: The full immersive soundtrack for Starship Horizons Bridge Simulator.
